TABLE.NAME: question_graphchecker_opts
TABLE.COMMENT: Extension of the graphchecker question table

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question this option applies to.

FIELD.NAME: answertype
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of answer we expect the student to give.

FIELD.NAME: answerpreload
FIELD.COMMENT: Answer to be preloaded when question is posed to the student.

FIELD.NAME: answer
FIELD.COMMENT: A sample solution to the problem. Should satisfy all checks.

FIELD.NAME: validateonsave
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, the sample answer will be checked when saving and saving will be aborted if the tests don't pass.

FIELD.NAME: checks
FIELD.COMMENT: The checks, as a JSON string.

FIELD.NAME: allowed_vertex_edits
FIELD.COMMENT: Which types of vertex edits to allow ('none' / 'layout' / 'attributes' / 'add_remove' / 'all')

FIELD.NAME: allowed_edge_edits
FIELD.COMMENT: Which types of edge edits to allow ('none' / 'layout' / 'attributes' / 'add_remove' / 'all')

FIELD.NAME: vertex_highlight
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to allow the student to highlight vertices (0 / 1)

FIELD.NAME: edge_highlight
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to allow the student to highlight edges (0 / 1)

FIELD.NAME: vertex_labels
FIELD.COMMENT: Which vertex labels to allow (temporary WIP field, currently unused)

FIELD.NAME: edge_labels
FIELD.COMMENT: Which edge labels to allow (temporary WIP field, currently unused)

FIELD.NAME: lock_preload
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to lock the preload graph (0 / 1)
